snippet.title: Fantasy football impact as Chris Johnson becomes the newest New York addition
snippet.description:
Fantasy football impact as Chris Johnson becomes the newest New York addition by Daniel Kelley on Apr 17 2014, 9:00a
The Jets have spent the offseason trying to get something, anything from its offensive skill players, with Wednesday's signing of Chris Johnson the latest attempt. We break down the fantasy...

snippet.title: Maurkice Pouncey will be seeking a major payday
snippet.description:
Maurkice Pouncey will be seeking a major payday by Matt Verderame on Apr 14 2014, 11:58a
Pouncey is in line for a new contract after 2014, and it will undoubtedly be affected by Alex Mack's deal.

snippet.title: 2014 NFL Draft rumors: Kelvin Benjamin 'too tired' to meet coach, McNeese State TE getting attention
snippet.description:

Kelvin Benjamin was reportedly "too tired" to meet with an NFL coach on Thursday, sparking questions about his work ethic. Nic Jacobs, meanwhile, is drawing interest from teams despite his...

snippet.title: NFL Draft 2014: Austin Seferian-Jenkins is grown up and ready for the NFL
snippet.description:
NFL Draft 2014: Austin Seferian-Jenkins is grown up and ready for the NFL by Louis Bien on Apr 11 2014, 8:00a
Austin Seferian-Jenkins spoke with SB Nation about his preparation for the NFL Draft, and the lessons he has learned since his 2013 DUI arrest.

snippet.title: Quotable: Steelers expecting big jump from Markus Wheaton
snippet.description:
Quotable: Steelers expecting big jump from Markus Wheaton by Matthew Fairburn on Apr 7 2014, 8:08a
The Steelers have had a lot of turnover at wide receiver, but Mike Tomlin thinks the solution is already on the roster.

snippet.title: The not-so-terrible, not-so-horrible, not-so-bad, pretty good Pirates
snippet.description:
The not-so-terrible, not-so-horrible, not-so-bad, pretty good Pirates by Nick Bond on Apr 6 2014, 10:00a
After two decades of bad baseball, the Pirates look to be on the cusp of a prolonged resurgence. That's thanks in large part to NL MVP Andrew McCutchen, newly extended GM Neal Huntington and...

snippet.title: NFL roundup: DeSean Jackson finalizes contract with Redskins, Steelers sign Darrius Heyward-Bey
snippet.description:
NFL roundup: DeSean Jackson finalizes contract with Redskins, Steelers sign Darrius Heyward-Bey by Jon Benne on Apr 2 2014, 5:50p
DeSean Jackson's deal with the Redskins is for three years and includes $16 million guaranteed. In other NFL news, Darrius Heyward-Bey signed with the Steelers.

snippet.description:
DeSean Jackson's fantasy value for 2014 with Washington Redskins by Kenneth Arthur on Apr 2 2014, 1:32p
The Washington Redskins signed wide receiver DeSean Jackson. We break down the fantasy implications.

snippet.title: NFL news: Orson Charles arrested, Jim Kelly to undergo chemotherapy
snippet.description:
NFL news: Orson Charles arrested, Jim Kelly to undergo chemotherapy by Adam Stites on Apr 1 2014, 4:59p
Cincinnati Bengals fullback Orson Charles was arrested, Jim Kelly will begin chemotherapy soon and more from the NFL on Tuesday.
